title: How is the information technology field? - Quora

response.answer_text: the field is good…but not the same for experienced folks.. 2–5 years of experience : very good/ excellent 5- 9 years of experience: good 10–13 of experience: average 13+ of experience: bad… You are trapped into a hell of problems… I am talking about India..

The biggest truth in Information Technology is that if you don’t embrace it, it will crush you. You have to be constantly updating and upgrading yourself and the same applies to everything around you.
